metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Mix barbecue sauce, chicken broth, and brown sugar, and brown sugar, and pour over pork . Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours until pork shreds easily . Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours until pork shreds easily .
